guidelines: Ensure adequate color contrast for both light and dark themes
Use semantic heading structure with title slot
Provide descriptive link text for call-to-action buttons
Test keyboard navigation through all interactive elements

Ensure call-to-action text clearly indicates the expected action
Consider vertical spacing in relation to surrounding content
Test appearance with both theme variations
